Module technology.sola.engine
Package technology.sola.engine.physics.system.collision

Interface CollisionDetectionBroadPhase

All Known Implementing Classes:
QuadTreeCollisionDetectionBroadPhase, SkipCollisionDetectionBroadPhase, SpatialHashMapCollisionDetectionBroadPhase
@NullMarked public interface CollisionDetectionBroadPhase
CollisionDetectionBroadPhase defines the contract for a broad phase collision detection algorithm to be used by CollisionDetectionSystem.
